title: [Yegharren Valley, Ravine]
description: Huge boulders are scattered about the floor of the ravine, some old and weather-worn, some shattered into knife-sharp shards in their recent fall from above.  A long-standing heap of stone forms a natural staircase leading up the ravine wall to an overhanging ledge above.

Huge boulders are scattered about the dark floor of the ravine, some old and weather-worn, some shattered into knife-sharp shards in their recent fall from above.  A long-standing heap of stone forms a natural staircase leading up the ravine wall to an overhanging ledge above.
